programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae finally reunite with Yu Ran, his biological mother. Chi Hyeon begins to look for his real father.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Sim Cheong becomes confused when the memory of how Dam Ryeong and she broke up in the past got recalled.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: After the death of Heo Il Joong, Joon Jae and Dong Pyo speed up their investigation.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Sim Cheong gets shot instead of Joon Jae, and Ma Dae Young visits Professor Jin to bring back all his memory.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Sim Cheong says last goodbye to the people around her to go back to the sea.

programme.desc: Miehistö joutuu kahden Nietzschean ylpeyden väliseen taisteluun vangitessaan vihamielisen, joka väittää, että hänen ylpeydellään on liukuvirran kartta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Väärä käänne liukuvirran poistumisen jälkeen lähettää Andromedan Prolon-järjestelmään. He pelastavat Escape-podin tietyiltä katastrofeilta, mutta ylpeys haluaa sen takaisin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehistö etsii kadonnutta nietzscheläisten siirtokuntaa ja löytää toisen miehistön, joka on salaa auttanut heitä.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehistö asentaa uuden tekoälyn uuteen kansainyhteisön taistelulaivaan, ja luonnollisesti asiat eivät suju niin kuin pitäisi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Viesti keräilijältä lähettää Dylanin pelastamaan panttivangin ja löytämään Kansainyhteisön laivaston jäännökset.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Citizen Eight yrittää poistaa Dylanin Andromedan komennosta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehistön on pysäytettävä maailman laivanrakentaja ennen kuin hän aloittaa uuden hyökkäyksen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Nietzscheläiset kidnappaavat Dylanin ja pakottavat hänet pelaamaan ajatusleikkejä vangitsijoidensa huviksi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kaksi Nietzschean sisarusta ovat vastakkainasettelussa Aseesta, joka voi poistaa korkeammat aivotoiminnot.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Seurauksena on panttivankitilanne, kun miehistö kohtaa Tyrin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Väärä käänne liukuvirrassa johtaa Andromedan vankilan mellakkaan.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromedan miehistö ryhtyy selvittämään, kuka tappoi tutkijaryhmän.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehistö palkattiin pelastamaan prinsessa pahamaineisesta lainsuojattomat, mutta pian paljastuu, että hän yritti paeta murhaa isänsä kädestä.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda löytää biopanssarilähetyksen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kokeellinen verhoutumislaite pudottaa Dylanin vaihtoehtoiseen universumiin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda joutuu kahden aluksen väliseen sotaan, johon liittyy kuolemaan johtava tauti.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rev huijaa Dylania ja kidnappaa hänet. Miehistö löytää odottamattoman liittolaisen keräilijästä.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kun osa miehistöstä vangitaan, Harper joutuu työskentelemään Patriarkan aikasillalla.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tri Gemman vakooja ilmestyy Andromedalle yrittäessään varastaa tähtikartan.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kun Rommie muuttuu liian tunteelliseksi, alus katkaisee hänen pääsynsä diagnostiikan suorittamiseksi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Abyss tappaa Bekan ystävän, ja miehistön on selvitettävä, mitä tietoja varten he tappoivat.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda pelastaa aluksen, joka palaa rauhanneuvotteluista Magogin kanssa.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan päätyy Seefraan, jossa taikauskoisella väestöllä ei ole teknologiaa.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka jätetään Seefraan Andromedan varastamisen jälkeen, ja Dylanin on todistettava, että alus on hänen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Vielä Seefralla Dylan löytää Harperin, joka on sopeutunut elämään siellä.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kävi ilmi, että Doyle on Harperin rakentama androidi, joka sisältää Rommien ydinohjelmoinnin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Alkuperäisen Kansainyhteisön tiedemies ilmestyy, kiinni ajan silmukassa.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Flavin palaa, mikä sytyttää jengisodan, ja auttaa Dylania kehittymään Paradinina.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Löydetään kristalli, joka voi palauttaa Andromedan voiman, mutta saadakseen sen Dylanin on työskenneltävä kaivoksen omistajalle.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Seefrasta löydetään tunneleita, joiden kautta voi päästä kahdeksalle muulle Seefra-planeetalle.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kun vanha mies tapetaan, Beka, Rhade ja Harper ovat pää epäiltyjä ja joutuvat oikeuteen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan saa selville, että Bekan poikaystävä oli oikeasti Drago Musevini, ja hän käytti Bekan DNA:ta luodakseen nietzscheläiset.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka ja Rhade joutuvat koetukselle, joka joko antaa heille suuren rikkauden tai ajaa heidät hulluuteen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Harper löytää ohjelman, joka voi tuhota kahdeksan Seefra-planeettaa ja tappaa miljoonia ihmisiä.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Samalla kun Harper yrittää pelastaa Seefra-järjestelmän, vakooja hiipii Andromedalle ja hyökkää Bekan kimppuun.

programme.title: The Cry of the Black Wolves
programme.desc: Halfwit Indian Akaena promises a fictitious treasure to anyone who takes her down south where the sun always shines.

programme.title: Bullwhip
programme.desc: In order to avoid the hangman's noose, a cowboy agrees to marry a beautiful but fiery redhead.

programme.title: Keoma
programme.desc: A half-breed ex-Union gunfighter attempts to protect his plague-ridden hometown from being overridden by his racist half-brothers and a Confederate tyrant.

programme.title: Long Live ... Your Death!
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 43, 44, 45
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Black Jack
programme.desc: After a bank robbery, Jack Murphy's gang turns on him when they suspect he’ll keep the loot. They torture him and kill his sister, but Jack survives. Now, he rides for revenge in this gritty Western tale of betrayal, violence, and retribution.

programme.title: Find a Place to Die
programme.desc: An outcast Confederate soldier redeems himself by defending a woman against bandits willing to kill for her goldmine claim.

programme.title: The Mercenary
programme.desc: A greedy Polish mercenary aids a mine worker and peasant girl as they lead a revolution against the oppressive Mexican Government, and are pursued by an American rival.

programme.title: White Fang
programme.desc: The wolf dog, White Fang, aids a reporter, a fur trapper, a nun, a young Eskimo boy and his father of ridding a gold mining town of a sleazy crime lord in 1896 Yukon, Canada.

programme.title: Git Along Little Dogies
programme.desc: When war breaks out between oilmen and cattle ranchers, Gene sides with the ranchers until he learns that oil will bring a railroad to town.

programme.title: Mackenzie's Raiders EP09-12
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Ramon the Mexican
programme.desc: Ramon avenges his brother's murder and kills the Baxter Family.

programme.title: No Killing Without Dollars
programme.desc: Lawrence White returns to Owell Rock seeking revenge for his father’s murder. To protect his identity and strategy, he adopts a new name and hires another man to impersonate Lawrence White, setting a dangerous game of deception and vengeance in motion.

programme.title: The Southerner
programme.desc: The life of the poor Tucker family, that worked as cotton pluggers and decided to get their own ground, but nature is against them.

programme.title: Texas, Adios
programme.desc: A Texas sheriff and his younger brother travel across the Mexican border to confront the man who killed their father.

programme.title: Fat Brothers of Trinity
programme.desc: The bizarre adventures of the three gunmen Western grosser, next to a delicate young.

programme.title: Shoot the Living and Pray for the Dead
programme.desc: After Dan Hogan and his gang rob a bank, they hire a mysterious man to guide them across the Mexican border in return for half of the loot.

programme.title: Heads or Tails
programme.desc: Shanda is charged with the murder of the banker, Burton and to save her from being lynched, the sheriff sends her off to Phoenix. During the trip the two deputies to whom she’s been entrusted rape and leave her in the desert, certain that she’s dead. The girl is found by Black Talisman, an outlaw, who takes her to his hideout, nurses her back to health and after hearing her story, determines to avenge her and clear her name.

programme.title: Man, Pride & Vengeance
programme.desc: A stalwart Spanish soldier turns to a life of crime to prove his love for a mysterious and promiscuous gypsy woman.

programme.title: Fistful of Lead
programme.desc: Sartana contends with various parties - including a dapper rival gunfighter, an alluring saloon owner and a Mexican bandit - who are intent on acquiring a mining director's gold.

programme.title: Companeros!
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: Apache Rifles
programme.desc: In 1879 Arizona, Captain Jeff Stanton leads a cavalry unit to return the Mescalero Apaches to their reservation after attacks on settlers. Capturing the chief's son, Stanton negotiates a fragile truce, but greedy townsfolk plot to break it. As Stanton is replaced by a harsher commander, tensions rise, leading to disastrous consequences for both sides.

programme.title: Killer Caliber 32
programme.desc: Hired gun Silver kills a masked gang’s seven members one by one, using silver bullets and his own code of justice. Between poker games and saloon girls, his mission leads to the dramatic unmasking of the gang’s ruthless leader. Silver’s style and honor make him a deadly force in this action-packed tale.

programme.title: The Godless Ones
programme.desc: An outlaw and a bounty hunter are searching for Mexican bandit Corbancho, who is running the El Paso area, and has also robbed the Bank of Tuscon of $400,000.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter in Trinity
programme.desc: The townsfolk of Trinity decide to hire a notorious bounty hunter to protect them from a fierce band of Mexican outlaws who are terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Requiescant
programme.desc: The adopted son of a preacher comes upon a village that is under the thumb of a deranged ex-Confederate officer, who is - among other things - stealing land from the locals with phony land grants.

programme.title: The Great Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A blind man wants to get his mitts on a crooks' gold. He can't do it alone, so he hires the quartet of soldiers-of-fortune to help him.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Jesse James' Women
programme.desc: Jesse James is involved with four women: a saloon keeper, a banker’s daughter, a singer and a cattle baroness. Their ties, often driven by gain, ignite rivalry and tension.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Wild One
programme.desc: A Native American doctor finds himself the victim of discrimination when he sets up his practice in a new settlement.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Abilene Town
programme.desc: When an uneasy truce between cattlemen and homesteaders is broken in Abilene, Texas, Marshall Dan Mitchell (Randolph Scott) must resolve the conflict as he tries to manage the two women in his life.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Cimarron Strip - The Roarer
programme.desc: After a comrade’s death, a grief-stricken cavalry sergeant lashes out, killing a citizen and fleeing justice. Marshal Crown must track him down before the town takes revenge.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Jesse James Meets Frankenstein
programme.desc: Jesse James meets Baron Frankenstein’s granddaughter, who keeps the monster’s brain and seeks a new body in Jesse’s cohort, leading to a showdown between gunslinger and creature.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Delaware Hoax
programme.desc: The Delaware tribe is framed for a murder they didn't commit and they're ready to go to war against the white settlers. Hawkeye learns that a scheming land speculator is to blame and goes undercover to bring justice.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Daniel Boone - Trail Blazer
programme.desc: Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) builds a home in Kentucky’s 18th-century wilderness, defending Boonesborough settlers from Shawnee raids and British attacks.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Franklin Story
programme.desc: When the corrupt authorities of a small town are guilty of numerous crimes, Hawkeye calls on his friend Ben Franklin to prosecute them to the full extent of the law.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Joshua
programme.desc: When a black cavalryman returns home from the Civil War to find his mother murdered, he sets out on the trail of her killers in search of revenge.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.desc: A gang member misled by his leader kidnaps Dulcey, vowing to release her only if the ruthless Arn Tinker is arrested and hanged. Emotions run high in this gripping episode.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Joshua
programme.desc: When a black cavalryman returns home from the Civil War to find his mother murdered, he sets out on the trail of her killers in search of revenge.

programme.title: Royal Ashes
programme.desc: Nineteen year old Paul Royal is trapped in a life he didn't ask for.

programme.title: Slaughter Is The Best Medicine
programme.desc: A simple rendition turns into a blood bath as six veteran British commandoes try to capture a renegade scientist and unwittingly fall prey to the ultimate foe.

programme.title: Art Show Bingo
programme.desc: A talented young painter leaves the family self-storage business to pursue a life in the world of outdoor art shows.

programme.title: Appleton
programme.desc: In the rural farm town of Appleton, Wisconsin, a harsh winter has set in and a rogue figure named Mitchell has returned to the town he once terrorized.

programme.title: A Murder of Innocence
programme.desc: A new pastor learns how important it is to provide stability, healing and hope after a double homicide shakes his community to its core.

programme.title: Brush with Danger
programme.desc: Siblings Ken and Alice become entangled with Seattle criminals who want to exploit their talent as martial artists.

programme.title: Eternal Code
programme.desc: Eternal life technology (transferring mind to new body) is developed by 2 companies. Resistance to the merger of the 2 companies is met with kidnapping and murder.

programme.title: Sum of Existence
programme.desc: Liz is the victim of a vicious assault but is hypnotized to forget it ever happenned. However the attacker will go to any lengths to make sure she never forgets him.

programme.title: Evol
programme.desc: A troubled 17 year old boy is forced to move to New York City for psychiatric care. Throughout the summer he learns not only about the brutalities of life, but the realities of love.

programme.title: Of Dice and Men
programme.desc: The lives of six roleplaying gamer friends are thrown into upheaval when one of them enlists to go to Iraq. A geek movie without the self-loathing.

programme.title: Little Mermaid
programme.desc: A mermaid discovers harsh realities when she leaves the ocean to be with a human she barely knows.

programme.title: Aquarians
programme.desc: A wintertime drama about a seminary student who returns to his hometown and is compelled to reconnect with his estranged brother.

programme.title: Elle: A Modern Cinderella Tale
programme.desc: Elle (Ashlee Hewitt) is a girl who wants to be a singer and lives with her uncle, the owner of a small independent record label, after her parents died.

programme.title: Heart of Wilderness
programme.desc: On the run in the wilderness, Travis and Aimee navigate icy waters and the secrets they keep.

programme.title: The Boatman
programme.desc: A dedicated border coyote is haunted by the memories of those he failed to help.

programme.title: Someone I Used to Know
programme.desc: An overweight man meets a former classmate on their high school track. As the two grow close and inspire each other, their pasts creep back into their lives and begin to threaten all that they have developed.

programme.title: Bittersweet Monday
programme.desc: An emotional goodbye between longtime best friends begins an unexpected love affair, putting two marriages and many friendships at stake.

programme.title: A Different Sun
programme.desc: A Chinese family moves from their native land to a town in Germany and struggles to adjust to the different culture.

programme.title: The Colour of Darkness
programme.desc: All the colour, depth and mystery of India's complex and riotous cultural heritage is brought to light in a single action which changes two countries forever.

programme.title: At the Frontera
programme.desc: When an ATF agent out of Houston is tasked to team up with the Mexico City District Attorney on a human trafficking case, he uncovers family ties with a serpentine real-estate developer. Now he must work with a criminal defense attorney to stop the reign of tyranny.

programme.title: Broken Contract
programme.desc: When Max, a down on his luck strip club owner, has his life and livelihood threatened by local gangsters, he turns to his wife’s connections for help and hires a hitman to solve the problem once and for all.

programme.title: Idled
programme.desc: Val relives his memories with Mickey as he travels to see his brother.

programme.title: Welcome to the Men's Group
programme.desc: A men's support group descends into chaos when longstanding conflicts threaten the trust among the men.

programme.title: Color Me You
programme.desc: A young woman's family pressures her to attend law school and join their practice, but she continues to follow her dream to become a painter.

programme.title: 30-Love
programme.desc: This anti-wave sports film is a provocative and disturbing character study of a man struggling to navigate his grief.

programme.title: Fighting Chance
programme.desc: An MMA fighter who has worked his entire life for a shot at the title must overcome extraordinary trials if he is ever to achieve his dreams and find his true purpose in life.

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: After her husband suffers a life-changing fire, trauma therapist Karen Williams discovers the limits of her expertise and must face her own fears while trying to save her marriage.

programme.title: Confused by Love
programme.desc: A non-social author and his socialite wife invites his rich friend and former ex-girlfriend to stay with them for five days in order to save their house from immediate foreclosure.

programme.title: Past Present Future
programme.desc: Rachel and Noah have been best friends since high school. They have also dated on and off over the years. They meet up for the first time after years apart.

programme.title: The View From Here
programme.desc: After a bad review of his new restaurant, a Bay Area chef must learn to cope with his struggling relationship and the death of his father.

programme.title: Something Good Coming
programme.desc: After an unforeseen store closure, two grocery store workers from different backgrounds are stuck spending time together over a weekend.

programme.title: Screened In
programme.desc: Peyton Hawthorne becomes disillusioned when she realizes her phone has taken over her life. She attempts to tackle her addiction but calamity ensues.

programme.title: In His Steps
programme.desc: When a homeless man interrupts the comfortable routine of First Church of Raymond, life will never be the same for the apathetic congregation.

programme.title: Vincent's Vow
programme.desc: A broken 30-year-old man who struggles with commitment, accepts a challenge to "learn what love is before claiming to love someone". The results are certainly not what he'd expect.

programme.title: 2 Weeks in Lagos
programme.desc: The film captures the excitement and vibrancy of everyday life in Lagos and reflects the complexity of life in Lagos, a dynamic city where anything is possible in 2 Weeks.

programme.title: The Dog Walker
programme.desc: A psychotic stalker forces a retired investigative journalist to solve a terrifying puzzle.

programme.title: The Wait
programme.desc: A mafia killer accepts to take the identity of his last victim in order to redeem his past. Two games of chess – one with his victim, the other with his boss – will stress the turning points of this change.

programme.title: Cassidy Red
programme.desc: A woman returns to her hometown seeking bloodthirsty retribution when her lover is killed by her scornful ex-fiancé.

programme.title: Sweet Pain
programme.desc: A man working hard to provide for his family faces conflict with his girlfreind when she tries to come in between him and his friend and business partner.

programme.title: Ralia's Secret
programme.desc: Ralia, feeling conflicted and burdened by a secret plan she harbours, must protect her secret at all cost when a familiar face from her past finds her and threatens to unravel her plans.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep5
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep6
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: The Missing Package
programme.desc: In The Missing Package, Detective Lazarus is almost done for the day when an unassuming middle-aged man walks in and reports a package he is expecting missing, but more importantly is the carrier who seems to have disappeared into thin air. This sets Detective Lazarus on a wild goose chase to find what appears to be a package determined not to be found and a carrier who appears to no longer exist.

programme.title: Borrowed Man
programme.desc: Chioma and Tope were best friends and flat mates until Tope steals Chioma’s boyfriend, Tega. After a year of marriage, Tope realizes that the man she married is an impossible man to live with. Following a series of violent encounters, Tope decides to leave the marriage, but Tega is a dangerous man and refuses to let go. Tope is left with no choice but to turn to her former friend, Chioma, for help.

programme.title: Lover's Nest
programme.desc: It is love at first sight when Kenny lays eyes on Mira, but she uses her career as an excuse not to commit to him. Will his persistence pay off or is there another reason Mira refuses to go out with him?

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Ruby Akubueze
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits it's all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Falz
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits it's all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: The Cheerleaders
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Three lovely ladies form a group with one desire; stay away from love and use men only for their own selfish desires. However, two of them fall in love and create a crack in the group. The remaining one stays true to the creed of The Cheerleaders and stays off love and men. But love would eventually puncture through the tough wall she had built against it and she would come to find out one thing in the end; everybody can find true love.

programme.title: Cruise And Clout
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a famous social media “power couple” find that they are losing their spotlight to a more relevant and entertaining couple, they decide to take drastic measures to get back their number one spot

programme.title: Too Late
programme.desc: A man constantly cheats on his girlfriend with no remorse, believing she will always forgive him and take him back, until one day he takes things too far and she decides to move on. He does all he can to get her back but is it too late?

programme.title: Music Republic
programme.desc: A young man trying to pursue his dreams in the music industry has to face different obstacles and doubters to reach his goal.

programme.title: Violet
programme.desc: Temi is on the verge of tying the knot with his long time girlfriend Renny, but inexplicably changes his mind when he meets a blind lady named Violet.

programme.title: One Night Stand
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Jide is engaged to be married to Cynthia and they have decided to wait until marriage to have sex but as their wedding date gets closer, he becomes insecure about his lack of sexual expertise and his friends’ constant jokes that Cynthia will leave him due to his lack of experience. When he meets a stranger after leaving his bachelor's party early, things take an unexpected turn as disaster strikes.

programme.title: Finding Faith
programme.desc: Two couples with two different life challenges are tested in their marriages and their faith in God. They they have to dig deeper into their strength to stay on the right path when faced with a so-called 'Man Of God'.

programme.title: Frenemy
programme.desc: In the process of divorcing her husband, Peggy moves out of the house to start a new life and, hopefully, to forget all about the opposite gender, but life has other plans for her.

programme.title: The Underhand
programme.desc: A woman bound by naivety and traditions continues to defend her husband even when he does all manner of evil to her.

programme.title: Best Friends
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Depressed after getting past for a promotion, Dami gets drunk and ends up in bed with Oduva, the borfriend of her best friend, Ruth, who is a chronic cheat. Ashamed of her actions, she seeks refuge with Richard and they join forces to take down Oduva, after Ruth realises there is something wrong with Oduva.

programme.title: Pressured
programme.desc: A woman is regarded as a spinster after a series of failed romances and feeling pressure from all around her to settle down with the next man that comes along.

programme.title: Adùnní
programme.desc: Adunni struggles with the weight of a secret she carries, but when she finds out her secret isn’t limited to just her alone, she find the inner strength to seek justice and speak out.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Kold AF
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Jaya Faya
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Unbridled
programme.desc: Yinka, a playboy, is only interested in an open marriage with a wife who will never question his moves or affairs with other women, and he, in return, wouldn’t care about what his wife does. Taking unusual steps in his search, he meets bisola, a gorgeous woman who is happy with the terms, not knowing she is in love with someone else. As time goes on, yinka starts to fall in love with bisola but she reminds him of their terms, causing yinka to want a review on their original arrangement.

programme.title: Sweet Pain
programme.desc: A man working hard to provide for his family faces conflict with his girlfreind when she tries to come in between him and his friend and business partner.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep5
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep6
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.desc: Chioma and Tope were best friends and flat mates until Tope steals Chioma’s boyfriend, Tega. After a year of marriage, Tope realizes that the man she married is an impossible man to live with. Following a series of violent encounters, Tope decides to leave the marriage, but Tega is a dangerous man and refuses to let go. Tope is left with no choice but to turn to her former friend, Chioma, for help.

programme.desc: It is love at first sight when Kenny lays eyes on Mira, but she uses her career as an excuse not to commit to him. Will his persistence pay off or is there another reason Mira refuses to go out with him?

programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits it's all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: For Richer
programme.desc: Leye and Hadiza Adeyemi have fallen out of love with each other and find themselves heading for a divorce. They are both very happy with this decision until Leye’s parents come to stay for the weekend and things gets very awkward.

programme.title: The Housekeeper's Daughter
programme.desc: A housekeeper and her boss decide to play matchmaker between her daughter and his son but plans go awry as an unforeseen chain of events and perhaps a sprinkling of fate bring about totally unexpected results.

programme.title: Samantha
programme.desc: An extranged couple decide to get together, along with their new partners, to discuss custody and well-being of the estranged couple's daughter, samantha. Things start to go awry as old wounds are reopened and old feelings, good and bad start to resurface.

programme.title: The Missing Heirloom
programme.desc: A very expensive family heirloom goes missing and now Detective Lazarus must find it before he loses his own life.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep7
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep8
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: A Dead Man's Tale
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A “responsible” married man was supposedly killed by his side chick in a hotel room while having fun. The late man’s children are determined to get justice for their father’s death, but their mother is bent on letting the suspected murderer go scott-free.

programme.title: Mad Woman
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Maria became the new maid for a woman to whom she had looked up. Maria expected to find an upstanding, perfect family; instead, she discovered that the woman whom she'd regarded highly was an abusive and possessive wife and a demon in disguise.

programme.title: Fashion Insider - Omone Faith
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Fashion Insider - Akin Faminu
programme.desc: Entertainment show that focuses on celebrities fashion styles on red carpet events and on social media.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Feud of the Trail
programme.desc: Feud of the Trail places the dashing Tom Tylerr, a B-Western star (and the original Captain Marvel) in dual roles; as a man seeking justice against a band of outlaws, and the bands vicious gang leader. Capably directed by helmer Robert F. Hill (Flash Gordon, Tarzan the Fearless), and shot at the iconic Lazy A Ranch outside of Los Angeles, the film follows Tom Wade, an honorable man with a face thats nearly identical to nefarious gang leader Jack Granger. Using this to his advantage, Wade exploits his similar looks to impersonate the gangster and infiltrate his band of ruffians.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden and Jackie Coogan. This episode, Hangfire, also stars Phil Arnold, Dorothy Patrick, and Herman Hack.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In Hush Money, the G-men are trying to clear a title for a ranch when they discover a murder. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after he's arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A railroad detective pursues the infamous female outlaw, Belle Starr, after a herd of horses are stolen from the U.S. Calvalry. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Belle Starr is played by Mary Windsor. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as railroad detective Matt Clark who needs to track down a group of cattle rustlers along with their notorious leader Billy the Kid (played by Richard Jaeckel).This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: A young boy runs away from home because he thinks his father is a coward for not standing up to his abusive boss. Jeff and Roy have to find the boy and convince him that his father is just doing what he has to do in order to provide for his family. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a woman arrives in town looking for her son. Roy checks around, and finds out that her son is not only in the area, but has become a notorious outlaw. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tribesmen war over the daughter of a Mingo Chief. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Winter essentials are stolen on their way to a village. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Farmer Perkins murders a store clerk in front of his wife, and is allowed to walk after his trial, the Cartwright's step in to make sure he'll be rearrested, tried, and hung.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Leather Burners
programme.desc: Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) gets the call when a herd of rustled cattle mysteriously disappear. Andy Clyde, Victor Jory and George Reeves (televisions Superman!) also star in this, the 42nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy features. If you look closely, you might even notice Robert Mitchum in an uncredited role!

programme.title: New Mexico
programme.desc: What happens when Abraham Lincoln himself comes to New Mexico to discuss a treaty with Native American chief Acoma (Ted de Corsia)? Can the hotbed of emotions be quieted by cavalry Captain Hunt (Lew Ayres)? Or will the Captains superiors insist on provoking with the native tribe? Find out what happens in this fictional tale packed with action from 1951!

programme.title: Captain Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: After Harry T. Collier, a beloved commissioner of Indian Affairs, is murdered in late March during the1880s, Captain Apache, an Indian graduate of West Point, is assigned by the army to investigate the crime. Suspecting that O.J., the sheriff of a town bordering the reservation may be involved in the killing, Apache travels there and finds the sheriff dining with his mistress Maude at the Paradise Saloon. Before Apache can question him, however, O.J. abruptly departs and rides out of town with Apache in pursuit. When Apache apprehends him, O.J. swears that he did not kill Collier and relates that the agents dying words were April Morning. Meanwhile, Griffin, a wealthy landowner and six of...

programme.title: Cry Blood Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: An Apache brave seeks vengeance on a band of sadistic gold hunters in this bloody drive-in western. Pitcalin (Jody McRae) leads the marauders who wipe out an Apache camp when they discover gold, only to watch their violent deeds lead to their own demise. Featuring a superb cast that also includes Dan Kemp, Robert Tessier, and Joel McRae, this coldblooded western tale was directed by character actor and filmmaker Jack Starrett (Cleopatra Jones, The Losers).

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers' next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isn't fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not it's up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: The Drifter
programme.desc: He only wants to return home to his cabin in the woods, but the man known as 'The Drifter' finds himself involved with a murder! Director William A. O'Connor, whose career included everything from drug scare movies to the early films of John Wayne, gives us a dramatic and savage tale of family secrets. With excellent performances by William Farnum and Noah Beery, The Drifter is an early talkie that still pulsates with the angst and melodrama of the silent era...

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila O'Conner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Arizona Thunderbolt
programme.desc: When Sue Bixby becomes his new boss, stagecoach robber Talbot reforms and goes after her rustled cattle. When he and his men are outnumbered fighting Lloyd's gang, Randall rides to get circus man Mahoney and his man shooting cannon.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In Ghost Town Mystery, Pat and Stoney investigate the mysterious closing of a government silver mine and the ghost town left in its wake. They meet several suspicious characters in the empty town, one of whom holds the answers they seek. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are dispatched to Central City to investigate the disappearance of two Postal Inspectors. They are puzzled by the large amount of mail being sent to the post office in the town of El Dorado. Puzzled, because El Dorado has been a ghost town for years. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is shot dead after discovering oil on his property. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951 .It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: An ex-con is released from prison seeking vengeance against those who put him there. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark tracks down the James Brothers who seek revenge on the law following the death of their half-brother.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Also, look for legendary tough guy actor lee Van Cleef as Jesse James.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Railroad detective Matt Clark is challenged by a band of freight-car robbers led by Apache chief Geronimo. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, plus Chief Yowlachie and Emile Meyer. Directed by William Witney.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Spirit of the Law
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Judge Bean intervenes when two brothers accuse each other of crimes including cattle rustling. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Bill Davis is killed and the Judge and Jeff track the killers to Mexico. They are joined by rancher John Gorman, who is suspiciously eager to instantly hang those responsible. Two mysterious riders complicate things. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook suspect that Carpenter is being bamboozled by the Mohawk guide helping him establish a new settlement. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a Tuscarawas man tries to incite war against the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: New Mexico
programme.desc: What happens when Abraham Lincoln himself comes to New Mexico to discuss a treaty with Native American chief Acoma (Ted de Corsia)? Can the hotbed of emotions be quieted by cavalry Captain Hunt (Lew Ayres)? Or will the Captains superiors insist on provoking with the native tribe? Find out what happens in this fictional tale packed with action from 1951!

programme.title: Texas Brooklyn and Heaven
programme.desc: When Eddie Tayloe (Guy Madison, 5 Against the House) receives $6,000 from his grandfather, he decides to leave his drab newspaper job and move to New York. His dream is to have a play produced on Broadway. Along the way he picks up a pretty hitchhiker (Diana Lynn, The Miracle of Morgan's Creek) who is also leaving her own dreary life for a shot at New York. Unfortunately, they find that the Big Apple is a hard place to make a living. But it's also a city where circumstances keep bringing them together!

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: A widow with a young daughter travels to a ranch in Wyoming to manage the household of a rancher. After a while the man and woman develop a relationship that leads to a marriage. But life in the harsh place takes its toll.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: What Would Jesus Do? The Journey Continues
programme.desc: The journey continues from What Would Jesus Do? (2010) as the drifter arrives into a new town inspiring a group of people to live as Jesus would.

programme.title: The Charm of Love
programme.desc: Art historian Maddie searches for the "Lovers Stone" in the Caribbean with the help of a charming hotelier.

programme.title: You Can't Fight Christmas
programme.desc: When the Christmas-loving designer Leslie meets handsome scroogey Edmund, she's determined to change his mind.

programme.title: Deadly Vows
programme.desc: Pastry chef Helena poisons men who don't meet her standards, but Helena's fiancé's sister smells danger.

programme.title: Deadly Exchange
programme.desc: A British exchange student upends her host family's life when she tries to take the place of their daughter.

programme.title: Episode 15 - 5:55
programme.desc: Vicki is forced to repeat the same day over and over as she searches for an antiquity: Pandora’s Box.

programme.title: Cooking with Love
programme.desc: When show host Chef Betty has an unexpected injury, Kelly hires hot-headed Chef Stephen as a replacement.

programme.title: Another Man's Wife
programme.desc: After a tragic car accident, a family gets away to a remote mountain cabin to recover and rebuild their lives. During their vacation, a handsome man befriends them only to get revenge and destroy what is left of their fragile lives.

programme.title: Do I Say I Do
programme.desc: Author Jessica Bender is forced to work with her former boyfriend and editor Mike Pryce. During this association, the two ex begin to realize that the spark of their love is not yet completely extinguished.

programme.desc: Brian and Jenny are preparing for the big opening of their bed and breakfast, Emily's Country Inn, when a huge storm hits Bucks County. Brian agrees to return to Wall Street to boost their funds, while Jenny scrambles to keep the opening on time.

programme.desc: Tara, a free spirit who doesn’t need love, asks the Love Club to help plan Tara’s commitment-to-herself party.

programme.title: Miss Me This Christmas
programme.desc: Regina falls for a billionaire while waiting for her divorce settlement, but her ex isn’t ready to let go.

programme.title: Kill Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: After her husband's death, Julie and her son move near his aunt, Alison, who secretly blames Julie for it.

programme.title: A Friend's Obsession
programme.desc: After Megan's fiancé is killed, Lloyd follows her to win her love, but her new boyfriend stands in the way.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tiny’s bar will close unless he pays $17K; customers rally to save it. Meanwhile, Jay’s hazing alarms.

programme.title: Episode 16 - Bugged
programme.desc: Coreen leads a case that takes them to an insect demon who is using local Goth kids to feed her swarm.

programme.title: Til Ex Do Us Part
programme.desc: As Kyle and Sophia reconnect, she's accused of assaulting his friend Claire, a woman he slept with once.

programme.title: The Perfect Stalker
